column4: I'm running ubuntu 9.10. After being logged in for 5 or 10 min everything slows down. Moving the mouse even causes cursor to blink like it can't be painted fast enough.
I tried using sawfish thought maybe it was gnome was to much for it. I've got sensors that say temp is 93f
Use top to see which process(es) is/are depleating your resources.
I looked on gnome system monitor and didn't see anything but I'll look at top and iotop
